meanings.sent1: The princess looked beautiful in her indued gown.
meanings.sent2: The tree was indued with colorful autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt fancy with its indued bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The sky was indued with a blanket of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The garden was indued with the fragrance of blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: Endowed or provided with a quality or ability
meanings.sent1: The superhero was indued with incredible strength.
meanings.sent2: The student was indued with a sharp intellect.
meanings.sent3: The chef felt indued with magical cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: The artist was indued with a creative spark that never faded.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was indued with lightning speed on the track.
